title: Unreal Engine 4.6.1 Compiled Installer
description:
Unreal Engine 4.6.1

Info
-Installation Time 10-15 min (depends on your pc specs)
-Setup Size 2.54GB
-After Installation 9.74GB

Included
-Unreal Engine 4.6.1 compiled
-Uninstaller is included
-Direct x June 2010
-Dot Net Framework 4.0
-source code where is it? click me!

Recommended Hardware
-Windows 7/8 64-bit
-Processor Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
-Memory 8 GB RAM
-Video Card NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series or -higher

Whats New in Unreal 4.6.0 + 4.6.1 hotfix <a href="
https://www.unrealengine.com/blog/unreal-engine-46-released" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://www.unrealengine.com/blog/unreal-engine-46-released</a> <a href="
https://forums.unrealengine....?54533-4-6-1-Hotfix-is-Live!" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://forums.unrealengine....?54533-4-6-1-Hotfix-is-Live!</a>

Screenshots <a href="
http://imgur.com/a/KAkLJ" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imgur.com/a/KAkLJ</a>

What you need	
-Visual Studio 2013 http://www.visualstudio.com/...ds/download-visual-studio-vs	
-NET 4.0 (included in setup)
-Directx June 2010 (included in setup)

Instructions
-Open shortcut on desktop or, EngineBinariesWin64UE4Editor.exe
-It will take a min or so to start up so give it time
-run as administrator
-After it starts up it will compile the shaders which takes time

Short Version	
1. Install
2. Open shortcut (Run as administrator)
3. Let it compile shaders (does it automatically)

Marketplace/Assets/Examples
uploaded 7 of 22
Marketplace content download:

1.tappy chicken
2.SwingNinja
3.Stylized
4.Platformer Game
5.Memory Game
6.Light Room Interior Daylight
7.BlackJack

Other
-This is already compiled and ready to go all you have to do is install it and run shortcut.
-"Updates are optional" just fixes some mistakes within the installer
-To install the updates just overwrite the setup files and then install
-It is best to install to your c: drive instead of c:program files this will fix both issues below


Optional Updates
none yet


Issues
-If it doesn't start-up right click on short-cut "run as administrator" if you install unreal engine to c: instead of c:program files you shouldn't have this problem
-Unable to load my old projects, install unreal engine to you c: drive (ex c:unrealengine) then try again
-MSCVCR120.dll is missing? Make sure you install visual studio 2013
